annotation: order of samples on the figures (For example, "NA" can be replaced by  "Baseline,Week_6,Week_12", or "Control;Case", or "High_level Low_level". Put reference group at the beginning, separate metadata levels by comma, space, or semicolon)
remove a sample if the total reads of the sample is less than 5,000
Taxa with at least 1% (or 0.1%) relative abundance in at least 5% (or 15%), respectively, of the samples will be kept in the feature table of the 16S rRNA profiles.
Definition of vagitype (or predominatant taxon with relative abundance no less than 10%)
show 12 most abundant taxa on the bar plot (value no more than 70 if parameter_28 = No)
vagitype number shown in the heatmap

Taxa threshold to define abundant taxa; Taxa with at least 10% (or 1%) relative abundance in at least 5% (or 15%), respectively, of the samples will be kept in the feature table of the 16S rRNA profiles.
fold threshold of significant changes (1 represents 2^1 or 2 fold change)
